thread.title: Gorillaz star Jamie Hewlett lands first fine art exhibit
thread.title_full: Gorillaz star Jamie Hewlett lands first fine art exhibit

title: Gorillaz star Jamie Hewlett lands first fine art exhibit
text:
Celeb Travel 
Gorillaz co-founder Jamie Hewlett is set to stage his first fine art exhibition in London in November. 
The artist is preparing to debut a show titled The Suggestionists, which will comprise of three bodies of work called Tarot, which will feature the art of tarotica, Honey will be an homage to 1960s and '70s exploitation movies, and Pines will show large-scale illustration of trees. 
The Suggestionists will open at the Saatchi Gallery on Nov. 18 and run until Dec. 2. A photo posted by hewll (@hewll) on Sep 16, 2015 at 6:00am PDT Reader's comments Â»
